title: Interior Minister condemns Attack on Police in Swabi, Pays Tribute to Martyred Officers
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 21 (APP): Federal Interior Minister Mohsin Naqvi has strongly condemned the tragic incident of firing on police personnel in Swabi.
In his statement, he paid rich tribute to the two martyred police officers, Jamaluddin and Zahid, who lost their lives in the attack.
Minister Naqvi expressed deep sympathy and condolences to the families of the martyred officers, stating, “We stand shoulder to shoulder with the grieving families of Jamaluddin and Zahid.”
He emphasized that the martyred officers attained the highest rank of sacrifice and that their bravery will always be remembered.
“The brave sons of Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Police have made countless sacrifices in the fight against terrorism,” he said.
Mohsin Naqvi saluted the unparalleled courage of the Khyber Pakhtunkhwa Police and assured that the sacrifices of the martyred officers will not go in vain.
